summary: Completed testing of UI/UX improvements on Messages page (Chat section) shared match cards and homepage default tab changes. Verified football API integration and backend functionality.

minor_issues.issue: Football-data.org API shows as inactive in admin system, but API validation and matches endpoint work correctly

authentication_issues.issue: Session expires quickly during testing, requiring frequent re-authentication

ui_improvements_verified.improvement: Default tab successfully changed from 'Popular' to 'Top Matches'
Background color changed from harsh dark (#1a242d/90) to softer bg-secondary/60
Gap increased from 1.5 to 2.5, py from 2 to 2.5 for better visual balance
Gap increased from 1.5 to 2.5, py from 2 to 2.5 for Advance/Remove buttons
Space-y increased from 2.5 to 3.5, padding improved from pb-3/pt-3 to pb-3.5/pt-3.5

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints functioning correctly (6/7 tests passed, 85.7% success rate)
Homepage loads with 'Top Matches' as default active tab
Football matches API returns 67 matches successfully
Football API key persisted correctly in backend/.env
Admin authentication working with session-based cookies
Navigation between homepage tabs works correctly
All main navigation links present and functional
Messages page loads for authenticated users
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Admin System APIs shows football-data.org as inactive (cosmetic issue only - API works correctly). Consider investigating session timeout for better user experience in Messages page.
